data.actual_result: Discord can no longer accept voice input till restarting it completly
data.short_description: Being in wow then muting your mic with a hotkey then unmuting your microphone will break voice input
data.steps_to_repro: - mute your mic with a hokey (Mine is shift + \) - after a little bit (like 30+ seconds) unmute your mic, it will work for a little bit then completly break - The only way to fix this is to restart discord completly
